comments.creator: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.text:
Currently, File > Open Saved Message only opens .eml files, as the name implies. We should make this handle more file types and just change it to File > Open. Specifically:

1) Open vCards, since we can do that via the command line now (technically you
   can do this by importing the vCard, but that's non-obvious).
2) Allow extensions to add alternate file types, e.g. .ics files for Lightning.
   Lightning is currently forced to do this:

   File > Open > Saved Message...
               > Calendar File...
